definition: place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: The boy plays up his strong points and minimizes his weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 這男孩誇大自己的長處，極力縮小自己的缺點。

sentences.english: Its advantages are simple geometry, radial load carrying capacity and high.
sentences.chinese: 它的長處是複雜的幾何體，徑向負荷承載才能和高。

sentences.english: Then focus on your strengths but don’t overdo it.
sentences.chinese: 利用你的長處但是不要做的過火。

sentences.english: “Isaw that George was an asset, ” Mr. Abraham said.
sentences.chinese: “我看到了喬治的長處，”亞伯拉罕說到。

sentences.english: Every archetype has strengths, weaknesses, gifts, and fears.
sentences.chinese: 每一個原型都有自己的長處，短處，天性，和恐懼。

sentences.english: Self-deprivation is no longer a virtue.
sentences.chinese: 自我約束不再是長處了。

sentences.english: Teams work together so they can improve their strengths and abilities.
sentences.chinese: 團隊要一起行動，這樣他們才能發揮長處和能力。

sentences.english: The wise old Mother Superior was dying.
sentences.chinese: 睿智的老女修道院長處在了彌留之際。

sentences.english: Domesticating translation also has its advantages and its due range of usage.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，歸化的翻譯策略也有其長處和適用的範圍。

sentences.english: Self-confidence, optimism and calmness are strong points in my personality.
sentences.chinese: 自信，樂觀，沉着冷靜是我的性格長處。

sentences.english: As is known to all, fake and inferior commodities harm the interests of consumers.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，冒充僞劣商品損害了消耗者的長處。

sentences.english: Recognize your strengths, even if you have to list all of them down.
sentences.chinese: 認清你的長處，即便是這需要你列出一張清單來發現。

sentences.english: I:  What do you consider your strenghts?
sentences.chinese: 那你認爲你有什麼長處？

sentences.english: They are strengths you have, often from birth.
sentences.chinese: 這些是你的長處，往往是天生的。

sentences.english: Pluses and minuses to both vehicles but I am attracted by the more luxurious interior of the QX.
sentences.chinese: 兩個長處和短處車，但我吸引更豪華的室內QX。

definition: pragmatic/flexible/to act differently in different situations/to accommodate to circumstances
willing (to do sth)/to take pleasure in
to master the subject via a comprehensive study of surrounding areas
to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
